title: Vegetarian bibimbap
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons sesame oil', '120g carrot matchsticks', '125g courgette matchsticks', '200g beansprouts, drained', '170g vacuum-packed or tinned bamboo shoots, drained', '125g tinned sliced mushrooms, drained', 'pinch salt, or to taste', '300g cooked rice', '35g sliced spring onions', '2 tablespoons soy sauce', '1/4 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1 tablespoon butter', '3 eggs', '1 tablespoon red chilli sauce or Korean pepper paste to serve']
